name: Torture a cheese sandwich: 2012 internet simulator
name_original: Torture a cheese sandwich: 2012 internet simulator
description:
The Newgrounds version is releasing June 11th on Pico day.

A nice little game where you kill a cheese sandwich in various ways. Nothing more to it.

If the animations are slow, it's not a bug it's because you're playing on a windows xp netbook with 1gb of ram

I have no idea how I came up with this idea, I was listening to a podcast one day and thought: what if I made a game where a sandwich was the main character? And uhh...here we are. This took a month in total, but it was more of an on and off project so it's more like a week.

Programs used: 

- Pencil2D

- Scratch 3.0

- Turbowarp

- Medibang Paint Pro

- Bandlab

.SB3 file + assets
